function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased social media use due to COVID-19 related news and anxiety.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being and increased anxiety.","Mitigation":"Encourage limited social media exposure and provide mental health support resources.","Technologies":"Mental health apps, digital well-being tools, and social media usage tracking.","People":"General public, especially those prone to anxiety and mental health issues.","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, and social media platforms."},{"Description":"Relying on social media for healthcare support and information.","Impact":"Reliance on potentially unreliable information and self-diagnosis.","Mitigation":"Promote verified healthcare sources and the use of telehealth services for professional consultation.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, healthcare information portals, and fact-checking tools.","People":"Individuals seeking healthcare support and information.","Owner":"Health authorities, healthcare professionals, and telehealth service providers."},{"Description":"Prediction of user behaviors and panic-related searches on Google Trends.","Impact":"Panic-induced behavior and misinformation based on search trends.","Mitigation":"Educate users on reliable sources of information and build awareness about panic-induced behavior.","Technologies":"Data analytics for misinformation detection, reliable information dissemination, and mental health support apps.","People":"General public influenced by panic-related search trends.","Owner":"Health agencies, data analytics professionals, and mental health professionals."}]}
